availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Ellen Crupper. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1853 to 1854. Farmer in Mason County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, p. 410. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Dover, District 3, p. 56. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Dover, p. 10. Journal of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky (Frankfort, KY: A. G. Hodges, State Printer, 1854), p. 3.
